languages.text: У каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} есть набор особых способностей, которые персонаж может применять в бою. Новые способности можно получить повышая уровень персонажа.
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.
languages.original_text: У каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} есть набор особых способностей, которые персонаж может применять в бою. Новые способности можно получить повышая уровень персонажа.

traits.locale_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}levels{/g}.
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}levels{/g}.
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}levels{/g}.
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.

languages.text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g} hat eine Reihe von einzigartigen Fähigkeiten, die ein Charakter im Kampf einsetzen kann. Charaktere erwerben Fähigkeiten, wenn sie neue Stufen erreichen.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.

traits.locale_text: Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin{/g} hat eine Reihe von einzigartigen Fähigkeiten, die ein Charakter im Kampf einsetzen kann. Charaktere erwerben Fähigkeiten, wenn sie neue {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufen{/g} erreichen.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} englobe un certain nombre de capacités uniques que les personnages peuvent utiliser au combat. Ils acquièrent celles-ci au fil des niveaux qu'ils atteignent.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} englobe un certain nombre de capacités spécifiques que les personnages peuvent utiliser au combat. Ils acquièrent celles-ci au fil des {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}niveaux{/g} qu'ils atteignent.

languages.text: 每种{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}都可以赋予角色独一无二的能力，这些能力可以在战斗中使用。角色升级时会获得新的能力。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.

traits.locale_text: 每种{g|Encyclopedia:Career}信条{/g}都可以赋予角色独一无二的能力，这些能力可以在战斗中使用。角色升级时会获得新的能力。{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}{/g}

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} tiene una serie de capacidades únicas que un personaje puede usar en combate. Los personajes adquieren capacidades conforme suben de nivel.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrina{/g} tiene una serie de capacidades únicas que un personaje puede usar en combate. Los personajes adquieren capacidades conforme suben de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}nivel{/g}.

languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} has a set of special abilities that a character can use in combat. New abilities can be obtained by increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}character level{/g}.

languages.text: それぞれの{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}には、キャラクターが戦闘中に使えるユニークなアビリティがいくつかある。キャラクターは、新しいレベルを獲得するにつれ、アビリティを獲得する。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.

traits.locale_text: それぞれの{g|Encyclopedia:Career}ドクトリン{/g}には、キャラクターが戦闘中に使えるユニークなアビリティがいくつかある。キャラクターは、新しい{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベル{/g}を獲得するたびにアビリティを獲得する。

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g}, karakterin çatışmada kullanabileceği bir dizi eşsiz kabiliyete sahiptir. Karakterler yeni seviye kazandıkça kabiliyet edinirler.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} has a number of unique abilities a character can use in combat. Characters acquire abilities as they gain new levels.
